Params: {2: 'Sophia', 3: "I won't give up... Sophia... merchant... keeps her end of the deal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'There has to be a way.', 3: '13', 4: '(Struggle and stand)', 5: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's right! If we do it together...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The Gray Raven Commandant is standing up, so... I...!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Rail Heterozygote keeps making twister, piercing shrieks. You cannot tell if it is roaring or wailing, crying or laughing.'}
{3: 'Bianca pats Sophia on her head before carrying her bow and walks to the front of the Rail Heterozygote.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I understood that there was no God in this world a long time ago, Sophia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'God does not help regardless of my prayers. But I never stop praying... praying to myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'm not praying for an answer from God. I'm seeking the answer deep within me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'At that moment, a breeze swirls around Bianca as she draws her bow, her figure divine like a saint.'}
{3: 'Her left hand raises the bow as the string draws tight. Overclocked particles hover in the air.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Commandant, can you give me a hand?'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I can also... create a window of opportunity!'}
{3: 'The speeding arrow launches with her command, hitting the gargantuan body of the Rail Heterozygote at the one single spot she was aiming.'}
